title: Environmental vs. intrinsic quenching at cosmic noon: Predictions from cosmological hydrodynamical simulations for VLT-MOONRISE
summary: This paper investigates the quenching of simulated galaxies across cosmic time, focusing on intrinsic and environmental mechanisms. It provides predictions for the VLT-MOONRISE wide-field spectroscopic galaxy survey, examining the quenching of central, high-mass, and low-mass satellites from cosmological hydrodynamical simulations.
